casebody.data:
Sidney PARKER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 11, 2017 Cheryl A. Juniewic, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Sidney Parker's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 421 , 151 A.3d 430 (2016), is denied.
